examples: His family comes first.
Knowledge of cooking comes easy to him.
Come rain or shine.
After dinner comes the reckoning.
All good things come to an end.
words.defineEn: to move or travel toward something or someone
words.defineVi: để di chuyển hoặc đi về phía một cái gì đó hoặc một ai đó

examples: The price includes dinner, bed, and breakfast.
After dinner comes the reckoning.
The bell sounded for dinner.
The government's latest proposals are a dog's dinner.
Dinner is served between 7 and 10 p.m.
words.defineEn: the main meal of the day, eaten either in the middle of the day or in the evening
words.defineVi: bữa ăn chính trong ngày, ăn vào giữa ngày hoặc vào buổi tối

examples: The soup needs a little more seasoning.
My friend Prepared a nourishing soup with cellophane noodles, mushrooms, and bok choy.
We enjoyed hot cabbage soup on a chilly evening.
I always garnish my soup with a sprinkle of fresh herbs.
My grandma makes the best homemade chicken soup.
words.defineEn: liquid food cooked in water, typically containing small pieces of meat, fish, or vegetables
words.defineVi: thức ăn lỏng được nấu trong nước, thường chứa những miếng thịt, cá hoặc rau nhỏ

examples: There's a lovely park right on our doorstep.
She was a lovely woman and my mother truly enjoyed her company.
I have been as busy as a beaver these last few weeks crocheting up custom orders for some lovely customers.
They’ve let that lovely old house fall to pieces around them.
The rose was pink and had a lovely scent.
words.defineEn: very beautiful or attractive
words.defineVi: rất đẹp hoặc hấp dẫn

examples: The recipe serves four people.
The recipe called for seven ingredients.
The recipe calls for thirty grams of sugar.
I never follow a recipe completely.
My favorite smoothie recipe always includes the juiciness of a Jaffa orange.
words.defineEn: the instructions on how to cook a certain food
words.defineVi: hướng dẫn cách nấu một món ăn nhất định

examples: The days passed slowly.
The time passed quickly.
The day and night passed slowly.
The feeling of sickness soon passed.
Unemployment has now passed the three million mark.
words.defineEn: (of rights or property) to be transferred to another person
words.defineVi: (về quyền hoặc tài sản) được chuyển giao cho người khác

examples: Pass the salt, please.
He put salt into the sugar bowl by mistake.
Can you please pass the salt?
The soup needed a little more salt to bring out the taste.
Take a stock tip with a grain of salt.
words.defineEn: a natural, white substance, obtained from mines and also found in seawater that is added to the food to make it taste better or to preserve it
words.defineVi: một chất tự nhiên, màu trắng, thu được từ các mỏ và cũng được tìm thấy trong nước biển được thêm vào thực phẩm để làm cho thức ăn ngon hơn hoặc để bảo quản

examples: Our waitress poured water for everyone at the table.
Water will always find its own level.
My mother waters the plants in our garden every morning.
Police turned water cannon on the rioters.
The water boiled away.
words.defineEn: a liquid with no smell, taste, or color, that falls from the sky as rain, and we use for washing, cooking, drinking, etc.
words.defineVi: một chất lỏng không mùi, không vị, không màu, từ trên trời rơi xuống dưới dạng mưa, và chúng ta dùng để giặt giũ, nấu ăn, uống, v.v.

examples: The dessert was beautifully presented with a garnish of chocolate shavings on top.
The chef incorporated chunks of multiple fruits into a delectable dessert.
The combination of ripe cherimoya and coconut milk created a heavenly dessert pudding.
Our dessert of the day is a delectable almond-leaved pear tart.
The subtle bitterness of artemisia balanced the sweetness of the dessert.
words.defineEn: ‌sweet food eaten after the main dish
words.defineVi: món ngọt ăn sau món chính

examples: The marang ice cream had a velvety texture and a delightful sweetness.
My favourite ice cream shop went out of business last summer.
The ice cream truck played a catchy tune to attract customers.
I added a scoop of chocolate ice cream to my glass of milk for an extra creamy texture.
She scooped ice cream into a bowl using a spoon.
words.defineEn: a sweet and cold dessert that is made from a mixture of milk, cream, sugar, and various flavorings
words.defineVi: một món tráng miệng ngọt và lạnh được làm từ hỗn hợp sữa, kem, đường và các hương liệu khác nhau

examples: She made coffee for us all.
The coffee in the mug was a dark.
The coffee table was a dark wood color.
Surprisingly, the little café had the best coffee in town.
The little café had, surprisingly, the best coffee in town.
words.defineEn: a drink that is made from mixing water with some crushed seeds, called coffee beans, usually hot and brown in color
words.defineVi: một thức uống được làm từ nước trộn với một số hạt nghiền nhỏ, được gọi là hạt cà phê, thường nóng và có màu nâu

examples: Good wine can make a meal.
Red wine leaves a stain.
The California vineyards produce excellent wines.
The grapes are made into wine.
The waiter opened the bottle of wine for the guests.
words.defineEn: a drink that is alcoholic and mostly made from grape juice
words.defineVi: một thức uống có cồn và chủ yếu được làm từ nước ép nho

examples: Danish Blue cheese is fantastic in vegetarian dishes.
The vibrant hue of damson makes it a fantastic ingredient for homemade fruit popsicles.
Take time by the forelock and accept that fantastic internship!
She told me that yeast extract is a fantastic seasoning substitute for reducing sodium in my meals.
All my friends agree that Gruyère is a fantastic melting cheese.
words.defineEn: extremely amazing and great
words.defineVi: cực kỳ tuyệt vời và tuyệt vời

examples: Add a spoonful of yogurt to your smoothies for a creamier texture and a boost of probiotics.
He stirred a spoonful of molasses into his morning coffee.
I stirred a spoonful of ground aniseed into my hot chocolate.
A spoonful of bouillon adds a burst of flavor to the steamed vegetables.
My father added a spoonful of baobab powder to my morning smoothie for an extra boost of vitamin C.
words.defineEn: the amount that one spoon will hold
words.defineVi: số lượng mà một muỗng sẽ giữ

examples: He dipped his strawberries into a bowl of chocolate syrup.
A strawberry margarita, but hold the tequila.
You can buy strawberries all year round, but at a price.
The strawberries and clotted cream combined to create a heavenly dessert parfait.
The candy had an artificial strawberry flavor that burst in your mouth.
words.defineEn: a soft, red juicy fruit with small seeds on its surface
words.defineVi: một loại trái cây mềm, mọng nước màu đỏ với những hạt nhỏ trên bề mặt của nó

examples: At last the wind dropped.
Her eyes dropped to her lap.
I dropped another plate!
His voice dropped to a whisper.
The spoon dropped with a clatter from her hand.
words.defineEn: a small amount of liquid or solid that falls or is released in a rounded shape
words.defineVi: một lượng nhỏ chất lỏng hoặc chất rắn rơi xuống hoặc thoát ra ở dạng tròn

examples: Memories of that day still bring a lump to his throat.
A major technological advancement like that is still light years away.
The child is still running a fever
Men still hold most positions of power in this country.
Our trip is still very much up in the air.
words.defineEn: (of a drink) not having bubbles in it
words.defineVi: (của một thức uống) không có bong bóng trong đó

examples: I made a refreshing summer beverage by muddling Concord grapes and adding sparkling water.
You think your personality is so sparkling?
But in 2020, his sparkling empire is taking hits on all sides from a global pandemic, and his critics are casting him as another billionaire seeking government bailouts.
In 2018, Climeworks also entered into a partnership with Coca-Cola, Switzerland, to provide CO2 for its sparkling water.
Inside the safe were trays of sparkling rings, necklaces, and earrings.
words.defineEn: (of drinks or beverages) containing bubbles
words.defineVi: (của đồ uống hoặc đồ uống) có bong bóng

examples: The chef peppers the steak with a blend of spices for a flavorful taste.
They passed around the pepper grinder at the dinner table.
She added a dash of cayenne pepper to her soup for an extra kick of flavor.
I tossed the roasted vegetables with olive oil and a sprinkle of salt and pepper.
I love to pepper my popcorn with a sprinkle of chili powder for a spicy snack.
words.defineEn: a powder made from dried peppercorn that is added to food to make it spicy
words.defineVi: một loại bột làm từ hạt tiêu khô được thêm vào thực phẩm để làm cho nó cay

examples: Did you put sugar in my coffee?
We used brown sugar as a key ingredient in our homemade barbecue sauce.
Do you take sugar in your coffee?
A teaspoon of sugar can sweeten your morning coffee or tea.
The chef used grape sugar to caramelize the top of the crème brûlée.
words.defineEn: a sweet white or brown substance that is obtained from plants and used to make food and drinks sweet
words.defineVi: một chất ngọt màu trắng hoặc nâu thu được từ thực vật và được sử dụng để làm thức ăn và đồ uống ngọt

examples: If you're worried about the caffeine, you can get a decaf powder as well.
So thanks to green chemistry, you can sip your decaf without worrying about harming the environment.
It turns out that like money, decaf coffee doesn’t grow on trees.
You're totally free to bash whatever or whoever you want, the president, Congress, tech bros, decaf coffee, Florida.
So the control group gets a placebo, in this case decaf.
words.defineEn: a type of coffee or tea that has had most or all of its caffeine removed
words.defineVi: một loại cà phê hoặc trà đã loại bỏ hầu hết hoặc tất cả caffein

examples: Grandma's crab apple sauce is really delicious.
I offered my guests delicious beetroot burgers as a flavorful vegetarian option.
The cranberry pie at the bakery is absolutely delicious, especially with a scoop of vanilla ice cream.
Fresh vegetables like tomatoes, cucumbers, and lettuce make a delicious salad.
It's just too delicious!
words.defineEn: having a good taste
words.defineVi: có một hương vị tốt
